heisig_constituent: sign of the bird, whiskey bottle, west, one
heisig_story: Though we shall later encounter the kanji for bird, we introduce this one for the tenth sign of the zodiac mainly because of its use as a primitive, where it has a different meaning.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: west, bird, sign of the bird, 5-7PM, tenth sign of Chinese zodiac, sake radical (no. 164)
koohiiStory1: The sign of the bird on this whiskey bottle is of course the Famous Grouse blended Scotch.
koohiiStory2: Normally birds fly south, but one bird flew west. People were worried about it and kept asking "Is there any sign of the bird ‚Äì you know, the one that flew west?".
Ru_Meaning: west, bird, sign of the bird, 5-7PM, tenth sign of Chinese zodiac, sake radical (no. 164)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the western (Ë•ø) one (‰∏Ä) has a sake flask
humanum_full_description_en:
A Bronze like wine respect of shape, unearthed the Xia Dynasty two inside big mouth statue conform to the shape, is "wine Zun Zun " early pictographic text, the ancient word " unitary " may represent " wine ", " wine " word three-body stone by The ancient text is " Unity ". Later, under the guise of the name of the earth branch. The bottom of the wine tank is pointed, so that a small half of the wine tank can be buried in deeper ground for storage and preservation.

The oracle bone inscriptions read as wine, which means the sacrifice of recommended wine, and it is also used as the earthly branch. Bronze inscription means wine, Zai Fuyan: "Wang Xiang (È£®) You (wine)", "Poetry. Daya. "Drunk": "Drunk with wine, and full with virtue." Used as the name of the earthly branch, it ranks tenth. Scholar: "Only (in) May, I am looking for Xinyou." It is also used as the name of a nation and a person.

"Said Wen": "You, it's also. In August, the millet is formed, it can be wine. It is like the shape of the ancient text. All the subordinates of the you are from the you. You, the ancient texts. From the Mao, Mao is the spring gate, everything is there. Out. You are the autumn gate, and everything has entered. One, it's like a closed door."
humanum_short_description_en: A Bronze " unitary " big mouth like a statue, is " respect " the beginning of the text, the original meaning of wine statue.

Heisig: Though we shall later encounter the kanji for bird, we introduce this one for the tenth sign of the zodiac mainly because of its use as a primitive, where it has a different meaning.
* As a primitive, it means whiskey bottle. In its pictograph, you can see the loosely corked lid, the bottle and the contents (about one-third full). You might also think of the Spanish "porr√≥n," a decanter shaped like a long-necked bird.

unitary
Basic explanation of words
unitary
y«íu
The tenth place on the earthly branch belongs to the chicken.
Used for timing: unitary hour (5 o'clock to 7 o'clock in the afternoon).
unitary
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[‚ë†]Ôºªy«íuÔºΩ
["Guangyun" and Jiuqie, there is, to. ]
The present character of "‰∏£1".
(1) Wine.
(2) Refers to wine vessels.
(3) Mature; old.
(4) The extension is contraction.
(5) The tenth place of the twelve earthly branches. It matches with the heavenly stems, or is used to record the years in the Tai Sui chronology.
(6) The tenth place of the twelve earthly branches. It is used to record the month, that is, the eighth month of the lunar calendar.
(7) The tenth place of the twelve earthly branches. Used to record the day.
(8) The tenth place of the twelve earthly branches. Used to record time. That is, from 17:00 to 19:00.
(9) One of the zodiac signs. Is a chicken.
(10) Ponds for water storage.
(11) Link "Jew".
(12) Refers to Xiaoyou Mountain. See "you point", "you room".
(13) Last name. Three Kingdoms Wei has Youmu. See "Three Kingdoms ¬∑ Wei Zhi ¬∑ Gaotang Long Biography".

Name meaning
: The original meaning is wine, which means mature and fermented; the tenth place of the earthly branches is chicken.
